card.name: Abyssal Hunter
card.text: {B}, {T}: Tap target creature. Abyssal Hunter deals damage equal to Abyssal Hunter's power to that creature.

card.name: Acidic Dagger
card.text: {4}, {T}: Whenever target creature deals combat damage to a non-Wall creature this turn, destroy that non-Wall creature. When the targeted creature leaves the battlefield this turn, sacrifice Acidic Dagger. Activate this ability only before blockers are declared.

card.name: Afiya Grove
card.text: Afiya Grove enters the battlefield with three +1/+1 counters on it. At the beginning of your upkeep, move a +1/+1 counter from Afiya Grove onto target creature. When Afiya Grove has no +1/+1 counters on it, sacrifice it.

card.name: Afterlife
card.text: Destroy target creature. It can't be regenerated. Its controller puts a 1/1 white Spirit creature token with flying onto the battlefield.

card.name: Agility
card.text: Enchant creature Enchanted creature gets +1/+1 and has flanking.

card.name: Alarum
card.text: Untap target nonattacking creature. It gets +1/+3 until end of turn.

card.name: Aleatory
card.text: Cast Aleatory only during combat after blockers are declared. Flip a coin. If you win the flip, target creature gets +1/+1 until end of turn. Draw a card at the beginning of the next turn's upkeep.

card.name: Amber Prison
card.text: You may choose not to untap Amber Prison during your untap step. {4}, {T}: Tap target artifact, creature, or land. That permanent doesn't untap during its controller's untap step for as long as Amber Prison remains tapped.

card.name: Amulet of Unmaking
card.text: {5}, {T}, Exile Amulet of Unmaking: Exile target artifact, creature, or land. Activate this ability only any time you could cast a sorcery.

card.name: Ancestral Memories
card.text: Look at the top seven cards of your library. Put two of them into your hand and the rest into your graveyard.

card.name: Armor of Thorns
card.text: You may cast Armor of Thorns as though it had flash. If you cast it any time a sorcery couldn't have been cast, the controller of the permanent it becomes sacrifices it at the beginning of the next cleanup step. Enchant nonblack creature Enchanted creature gets +2/+2.

card.name: Armorer Guildmage
card.text: {B}, {T}: Target creature gets +1/+0 until end of turn. {G}, {T}: Target creature gets +0/+1 until end of turn.

card.name: Ashen Powder
card.text: Put target creature card from an opponent's graveyard onto the battlefield under your control.

card.name: Asmira, Holy Avenger
card.text: Flying At the beginning of each end step, put a +1/+1 counter on Asmira, Holy Avenger for each creature put into your graveyard from the battlefield this turn.

card.name: Auspicious Ancestor
card.text: When Auspicious Ancestor dies, you gain 3 life. Whenever a player casts a white spell, you may pay {1}. If you do, you gain 1 life.

card.name: Azimaet Drake
card.text: Flying {U}: Azimaet Drake gets +1/+0 until end of turn. Activate this ability only once each turn.

card.name: Bad River
card.text: Bad River enters the battlefield tapped. {T}, Sacrifice Bad River: Search your library for an Island or Swamp card and put it onto the battlefield. Then shuffle your library.

card.name: Barbed Foliage
card.text: Whenever a creature attacks you, it loses flanking until end of turn. Whenever a creature without flying attacks you, Barbed Foliage deals 1 damage to it.

card.name: Barbed-Back Wurm
card.text: {B}: Target green creature blocking Barbed-Back Wurm gets -1/-1 until end of turn.

card.name: Barreling Attack
card.text: Target creature gains trample until end of turn. When that creature becomes blocked this turn, it gets +1/+1 until end of turn for each creature blocking it.

card.name: Basalt Golem
card.text: Basalt Golem can't be blocked by artifact creatures. Whenever Basalt Golem becomes blocked by a creature, that creature's controller sacrifices it at end of combat. If the player does, he or she puts a 0/2 colorless Wall artifact creature token with defender onto the battlefield.

card.name: Bay Falcon
card.text: Flying, vigilance

card.name: Bazaar of Wonders
card.text: When Bazaar of Wonders enters the battlefield, exile all cards from all graveyards. Whenever a player casts a spell, counter it if a card with the same name is in a graveyard or a nontoken permanent with the same name is on the battlefield.

card.name: Benevolent Unicorn
card.text: If a spell would deal damage to a creature or player, it deals that much damage minus 1 to that creature or player instead.

card.name: Benthic Djinn
card.text: Islandwalk At the beginning of your upkeep, you lose 2 life.

card.name: Binding Agony
card.text: Enchant creature Whenever enchanted creature is dealt damage, Binding Agony deals that much damage to that creature's controller.

card.name: Blighted Shaman
card.text: {T}, Sacrifice a Swamp: Target creature gets +1/+1 until end of turn. {T}, Sacrifice a creature: Target creature gets +2/+2 until end of turn.

card.name: Blind Fury
card.text: All creatures lose trample until end of turn. If a creature would deal combat damage to a creature this turn, it deals double that damage to that creature instead.

card.name: Blinding Light
card.text: Tap all nonwhite creatures.

card.name: Bone Harvest
card.text: Put any number of target creature cards from your graveyard on top of your library. Draw a card at the beginning of the next turn's upkeep.

card.name: Bone Mask
card.text: {2}, {T}: The next time a source of your choice would deal damage to you this turn, prevent that damage. Exile cards from the top of your library equal to the damage prevented this way.

card.name: Boomerang
card.text: Return target permanent to its owner's hand.

card.name: Breathstealer
card.text: {B}: Breathstealer gets +1/-1 until end of turn.

card.name: Brushwagg
card.text: Whenever Brushwagg blocks or becomes blocked, it gets -2/+2 until end of turn.

card.name: Builder's Bane
card.text: Destroy X target artifacts. Builder's Bane deals damage to each player equal to the number of artifacts he or she controlled put into a graveyard this way.

card.name: Burning Palm Efreet
card.text: {1}{R}{R}: Burning Palm Efreet deals 2 damage to target creature with flying and that creature loses flying until end of turn.

card.name: Burning Shield Askari
card.text: Flanking {R}{R}: Burning Shield Askari gains first strike until end of turn.

card.name: Cadaverous Bloom
card.text: Exile a card from your hand: Add {B}{B} or {G}{G} to your mana pool.

card.name: Cadaverous Knight
card.text: Flanking {1}{B}{B}: Regenerate Cadaverous Knight.

card.name: Canopy Dragon
card.text: Trample {1}{G}: Canopy Dragon gains flying and loses trample until end of turn.

card.name: Carrion
card.text: As an additional cost to cast Carrion, sacrifice a creature. Put X 0/1 black Insect creature tokens onto the battlefield, where X is the sacrificed creature's power.

card.name: Catacomb Dragon
card.text: Flying Whenever Catacomb Dragon becomes blocked by a nonartifact, non-Dragon creature, that creature gets -X/-0 until end of turn, where X is half the creature's power, rounded down.

card.name: Celestial Dawn
card.text: Lands you control are Plains. Nonland cards you own that aren't on the battlefield, spells you control, and nonland permanents you control are white. You may spend white mana as though it were mana of any color. You may spend other mana only as though it were colorless mana.

card.name: Cerulean Wyvern
card.text: Flying, protection from green

card.name: Chaos Charm
card.text: Choose one - Destroy target Wall; or Chaos Charm deals 1 damage to target creature; or target creature gains haste until end of turn.

card.name: Chaosphere
card.text: Creatures with flying can block only creatures with flying. Creatures without flying have reach.

card.name: Charcoal Diamond
card.text: Charcoal Diamond enters the battlefield tapped. {T}: Add {B} to your mana pool.

card.name: Chariot of the Sun
card.text: {2}, {T}: Until end of turn, target creature you control gains flying and its toughness becomes 1.

card.name: Choking Sands
card.text: Destroy target non-Swamp land. If that land was nonbasic, Choking Sands deals 2 damage to the land's controller.

card.name: Cinder Cloud
card.text: Destroy target creature. If a white creature dies this way, Cinder Cloud deals damage to that creature's controller equal to the creature's power.

card.name: Circle of Despair
card.text: {1}, Sacrifice a creature: The next time a source of your choice would deal damage to target creature or player this turn, prevent that damage.

card.name: Civic Guildmage
card.text: {G}, {T}: Target creature gets +0/+1 until end of turn. {U}, {T}: Put target creature you control on top of its owner's library.

card.name: Cloak of Invisibility
card.text: Enchant creature Enchanted creature has phasing and can't be blocked except by Walls.

card.name: Consuming Ferocity
card.text: Enchant non-Wall creature Enchanted creature gets +1/+0. At the beginning of your upkeep, put a +1/+0 counter on enchanted creature. If that creature has three or more +1/+0 counters on it, it deals damage equal to its power to its controller, then destroy that creature and it can't be regenerated.

card.name: Coral Fighters
card.text: Whenever Coral Fighters attacks and isn't blocked, look at the top card of defending player's library. You may put that card on the bottom of that player's library.

card.name: Crimson Hellkite
card.text: Flying {X}, {T}: Crimson Hellkite deals X damage to target creature. Spend only red mana this way.

card.name: Crimson Roc
card.text: Flying Whenever Crimson Roc blocks a creature without flying, Crimson Roc gets +1/+0 and gains first strike until end of turn.

card.name: Crypt Cobra
card.text: Whenever Crypt Cobra attacks and isn't blocked, defending player gets a poison counter.

card.name: Crystal Golem
card.text: At the beginning of your end step, Crystal Golem phases out.

card.name: Crystal Vein
card.text: {T}: Add {C} to your mana pool. {T}, Sacrifice Crystal Vein: Add {C}{C} to your mana pool.

card.name: Cursed Totem
card.text: Activated abilities of creatures can't be activated.

card.name: Cycle of Life
card.text: Return Cycle of Life to its owner's hand: Target creature you cast this turn becomes 0/1 until your next upkeep. At the beginning of your next upkeep, put a +1/+1 counter on that creature.

card.name: Daring Apprentice
card.text: {T}, Sacrifice Daring Apprentice: Counter target spell.

card.name: Dark Banishing
card.text: Destroy target nonblack creature. It can't be regenerated.

card.name: Dark Ritual
card.text: Add {B}{B}{B} to your mana pool.

card.name: Dazzling Beauty
card.text: Cast Dazzling Beauty only during the declare blockers step. Target unblocked attacking creature becomes blocked. Draw a card at the beginning of the next turn's upkeep.

card.name: Decomposition
card.text: Enchant black creature Enchanted creature has "Cumulative upkeep - Pay 1 life." When enchanted creature dies, its controller loses 2 life.

card.name: Delirium
card.text: Cast Delirium only during an opponent's turn. Tap target creature that player controls. That creature deals damage equal to its power to the player. Prevent all combat damage that would be dealt to and dealt by the creature this turn.

card.name: Dirtwater Wraith
card.text: Swampwalk {B}: Dirtwater Wraith gets +1/+0 until end of turn.

card.name: Discordant Spirit
card.text: At the beginning of each end step, if it's an opponent's turn, put a +1/+1 counter on Discordant Spirit for each 1 damage dealt to you this turn. At the beginning of your end step, remove all +1/+1 counters from Discordant Spirit.

card.name: Disempower
card.text: Put target artifact or enchantment on top of its owner's library.

card.name: Disenchant
card.text: Destroy target artifact or enchantment.

card.name: Dissipate
card.text: Counter target spell. If that spell is countered this way, exile it instead of putting it into its owner's graveyard.

card.name: Divine Offering
card.text: Destroy target artifact. You gain life equal to its converted mana cost.

card.name: Divine Retribution
card.text: Divine Retribution deals damage to target attacking creature equal to the number of attacking creatures.

card.name: Drain Life
card.text: Spend only black mana on X. Drain Life deals X damage to target creature or player. You gain life equal to the damage dealt, but not more life than the player's life total before Drain Life dealt damage or the creature's toughness.

card.name: Dread Specter
card.text: Whenever Dread Specter blocks or becomes blocked by a nonblack creature, destroy that creature at end of combat.

card.name: Dream Cache
card.text: Draw three cards, then put two cards from your hand both on top of your library or both on the bottom of your library.

card.name: Dream Fighter
card.text: Whenever Dream Fighter blocks or becomes blocked by a creature, Dream Fighter and that creature phase out.

card.text: Flying, trample Emberwilde Caliph attacks each turn if able. Whenever Emberwilde Caliph deals damage, you lose that much life.

card.text: Flying At the beginning of each player's upkeep, that player may pay {R}{R} or 2 life. If he or she does, the player gains control of Emberwilde Djinn.

card.name: Energy Bolt
card.text: Choose one - Energy Bolt deals X damage to target player; or target player gains X life.

card.name: Energy Vortex
card.text: As Energy Vortex enters the battlefield, choose an opponent. At the beginning of your upkeep, remove all energy counters from Energy Vortex. At the beginning of the chosen player's upkeep, Energy Vortex deals 3 damage to that player unless he or she pays {1} for each energy counter on Energy Vortex. {X}: Put X energy counters on Energy Vortex. Activate this ability only during your upkeep.

card.text: {B}: Fetid Horror gets +1/+1 until end of turn.

card.text: Enchant creature {R}: Enchanted creature gets +1/+0 until end of turn.

card.name: Flash
card.text: You may put a creature card from your hand onto the battlefield. If you do, sacrifice it unless you pay its mana cost reduced by up to {2}.

card.name: Flood Plain
card.text: Flood Plain enters the battlefield tapped. {T}, Sacrifice Flood Plain: Search your library for a Plains or Island card and put it onto the battlefield. Then shuffle your library.

card.name: Floodgate
card.text: Defender When Floodgate has flying, sacrifice it. When Floodgate leaves the battlefield, it deals damage equal to half the number of Islands you control, rounded down, to each nonblue creature without flying.

card.name: Fog
card.text: Prevent all combat damage that would be dealt this turn.

card.name: Foratog
card.text: {G}, Sacrifice a Forest: Foratog gets +2/+2 until end of turn.

card.name: Forbidden Crypt
card.text: If you would draw a card, return a card from your graveyard to your hand instead. If you can't, you lose the game. If a card would be put into your graveyard from anywhere, exile that card instead.

card.name: Forsaken Wastes
card.text: Players can't gain life. At the beginning of each player's upkeep, that player loses 1 life. Whenever Forsaken Wastes becomes the target of a spell, that spell's controller loses 5 life.

card.text: Flying {0}: Flip a coin. If you win the flip, Frenetic Efreet phases out. If you lose the flip, sacrifice Frenetic Efreet.

card.name: Grave Servitude
card.text: You may cast Grave Servitude as though it had flash. If you cast it any time a sorcery couldn't have been cast, the controller of the permanent it becomes sacrifices it at the beginning of the next cleanup step. Enchant creature Enchanted creature gets +3/-1 and is black.

card.text: If Gravebane Zombie would die, put Gravebane Zombie on top of its owner's library instead.

card.name: Grim Feast
card.text: At the beginning of your upkeep, Grim Feast deals 1 damage to you. Whenever a creature is put into an opponent's graveyard from the battlefield, you gain life equal to its toughness.

card.name: Grinning Totem
card.text: {2}, {T}, Sacrifice Grinning Totem: Search target opponent's library for a card and exile it. Then that player shuffles his or her library. Until the beginning of your next upkeep, you may play that card. At the beginning of your next upkeep, if you haven't played it, put it into its owner's graveyard.

card.text: Mountain Valley enters the battlefield tapped. {T}, Sacrifice Mountain Valley: Search your library for a Mountain or Forest card and put it onto the battlefield. Then shuffle your library.

card.name: Mtenda Griffin
card.text: Flying {W}, {T}: Return Mtenda Griffin to its owner's hand and return target Griffin card from your graveyard to your hand. Activate this ability only during your upkeep.

card.name: Mtenda Lion
card.text: Whenever Mtenda Lion attacks, defending player may pay {U}. If that player does, prevent all combat damage that would be dealt by Mtenda Lion this turn.

card.name: Mystical Tutor
card.text: Search your library for an instant or sorcery card and reveal that card. Shuffle your library, then put the card on top of it.

card.name: Natural Balance
card.text: Each player who controls six or more lands chooses five lands he or she controls and sacrifices the rest. Each player who controls four or fewer lands may search his or her library for up to X basic land cards and put them onto the battlefield, where X is five minus the number of lands he or she controls. Then each player who searched his or her library this way shuffles it.

card.name: Nettletooth Djinn
card.text: At the beginning of your upkeep, Nettletooth Djinn deals 1 damage to you.

card.name: Noble Elephant
card.text: Trample; banding

card.name: Nocturnal Raid
card.text: Black creatures get +2/+0 until end of turn.

card.name: Null Chamber
card.text: As Null Chamber enters the battlefield, you and an opponent each name a card other than a basic land card. The named cards can't be played.

card.name: Pacifism
card.text: Enchant creature Enchanted creature can't attack or block.

card.name: Painful Memories
card.text: Look at target opponent's hand and choose a card from it. Put that card on top of that player's library.

card.name: Patagia Golem
card.text: {3}: Patagia Golem gains flying until end of turn.

card.name: Paupers' Cage
card.text: At the beginning of each opponent's upkeep, if that player has two or fewer cards in hand, Paupers' Cage deals 2 damage to him or her.

card.name: Pearl Dragon
card.text: Flying {1}{W}: Pearl Dragon gets +0/+1 until end of turn.

card.name: Phyrexian Dreadnought
card.text: Trample When Phyrexian Dreadnought enters the battlefield, sacrifice it unless you sacrifice any number of creatures with total power 12 or greater.

card.name: Phyrexian Purge
card.text: Destroy any number of target creatures. Phyrexian Purge costs 3 life more to cast for each target.

card.name: Phyrexian Tribute
card.text: As an additional cost to cast Phyrexian Tribute, sacrifice two creatures. Destroy target artifact.

card.name: Phyrexian Vault
card.text: {2}, {T}, Sacrifice a creature: Draw a card.

card.name: Political Trickery
card.text: Exchange control of target land you control and target land an opponent controls.

card.name: Polymorph
card.text: Destroy target creature. It can't be regenerated. Its controller reveals cards from the top of his or her library until he or she reveals a creature card. The player puts that card onto the battlefield, then shuffles all other cards revealed this way into his or her library.

card.name: Power Sink
card.text: Counter target spell unless its controller pays {X}. If he or she doesn't, that player taps all lands with mana abilities he or she controls and empties his or her mana pool.

card.name: Preferred Selection
card.text: At the beginning of your upkeep, look at the top two cards of your library. You may sacrifice Preferred Selection and pay {2}{G}{G}. If you do, put one of those cards into your hand. If you don't, put one of those cards on the bottom of your library.

card.name: Prismatic Boon
card.text: Choose a color. X target creatures gain protection from the chosen color until end of turn.

card.name: Prismatic Circle
Prismatic Lace
card.text: Target permanent becomes the color or colors of your choice.

card.name: Psychic Transfer
card.text: If the difference between your life total and target player's life total is 5 or less, exchange life totals with that player.

card.name: Purgatory
card.text: Whenever a nontoken creature is put into your graveyard from the battlefield, exile that card. At the beginning of your upkeep, you may pay {4} and 2 life. If you do, return a card exiled with Purgatory to the battlefield.

card.name: Purraj of Urborg
card.text: Purraj of Urborg has first strike as long as it's attacking. Whenever a player casts a black spell, you may pay {B}. If you do, put a +1/+1 counter on Purraj of Urborg.

card.name: Pyric Salamander
card.text: {R}: Pyric Salamander gets +1/+0 until end of turn. Sacrifice Pyric Salamander at the beginning of the next end step.

card.name: Quirion Elves
card.text: As Quirion Elves enters the battlefield, choose a color. {T}: Add {G} to your mana pool. {T}: Add one mana of the chosen color to your mana pool.

card.name: Radiant Essence
card.text: Radiant Essence gets +1/+2 as long as an opponent controls a black permanent.

card.name: Raging Spirit
card.text: {2}: Raging Spirit becomes colorless until end of turn.

card.name: Rampant Growth
card.text: Search your library for a basic land card and put that card onto the battlefield tapped. Then shuffle your library.

card.name: Rashida Scalebane
card.text: {T}: Destroy target attacking or blocking Dragon. It can't be regenerated. You gain life equal to its power.

card.name: Ravenous Vampire
card.text: Flying At the beginning of your upkeep, you may sacrifice a nonartifact creature. If you do, put a +1/+1 counter on Ravenous Vampire. If you don't, tap Ravenous Vampire.

card.name: Ray of Command
card.text: Untap target creature an opponent controls and gain control of it until end of turn. That creature gains haste until end of turn. When you lose control of the creature, tap it.

card.name: Razor Pendulum
card.text: At the beginning of each player's end step, if that player has 5 or less life, Razor Pendulum deals 2 damage to him or her.

card.text: Target artifact, creature, or land phases out.

card.name: Reckless Embermage
card.text: {1}{R}: Reckless Embermage deals 1 damage to target creature or player and 1 damage to itself.

card.name: Reflect Damage
card.text: The next time a source of your choice would deal damage this turn, that damage is dealt to that source's controller instead.

card.name: Regeneration
card.text: Enchant creature {G}: Regenerate enchanted creature.

card.name: Reign of Chaos
card.text: Choose one - Destroy target Plains and target white creature; or destroy target Island and target blue creature.

card.name: Reign of Terror
card.text: Destroy all green creatures or all white creatures. They can't be regenerated. You lose 2 life for each creature that died this way.

card.name: Reparations
card.text: Whenever an opponent casts a spell that targets you or a creature you control, you may draw a card.

card.name: Restless Dead
card.text: {B}: Regenerate Restless Dead.

card.name: Ritual of Steel

card.name: Rock Basilisk
card.text: Whenever Rock Basilisk blocks or becomes blocked by a non-Wall creature, destroy that creature at end of combat.

card.name: Rocky Tar Pit
card.text: Rocky Tar Pit enters the battlefield tapped. {T}, Sacrifice Rocky Tar Pit: Search your library for a Swamp or Mountain card and put it onto the battlefield. Then shuffle your library.

card.name: Roots of Life
card.text: As Roots of Life enters the battlefield, choose Island or Swamp. Whenever a land of the chosen type an opponent controls becomes tapped, you gain 1 life.

card.name: Sabertooth Cobra
card.text: Whenever Sabertooth Cobra deals damage to a player, he or she gets a poison counter. That player gets another poison counter at the beginning of his or her next upkeep unless he or she pays {2} before that step.

card.name: Sacred Mesa
card.text: At the beginning of your upkeep, sacrifice Sacred Mesa unless you sacrifice a Pegasus. {1}{W}: Put a 1/1 white Pegasus creature token with flying onto the battlefield.

card.name: Sand Golem
card.text: When a spell or ability an opponent controls causes you to discard Sand Golem, return Sand Golem from your graveyard to the battlefield with a +1/+1 counter on it at the beginning of the next end step.

card.name: Sandstorm
card.text: Sandstorm deals 1 damage to each attacking creature.

card.name: Sapphire Charm
card.text: Choose one - Target player draws a card at the beginning of the next turn's upkeep; or target creature gains flying until end of turn; or target creature an opponent controls phases out.

card.text: {T}: Add {C} to your mana pool. {1}, {T}: Add {U} to your mana pool.

card.name: Shadowbane

card.name: Shallow Grave

card.name: Soul Echo
card.text: Soul Echo enters the battlefield with X echo counters on it. You don't lose the game for having 0 or less life. At the beginning of your upkeep, sacrifice Soul Echo if there are no echo counters on it. Otherwise, target opponent may choose that for each 1 damage that would be dealt to you until your next upkeep, you remove an echo counter from Soul Echo instead.

card.name: Soul Rend
card.text: Destroy target creature if it's white. A creature destroyed this way can't be regenerated. Draw a card at the beginning of the next turn's upkeep.

card.name: Soulshriek
card.text: Target creature you control gets +X/+0 until end of turn, where X is the number of creature cards in your graveyard. Sacrifice that creature at the beginning of the next end step.

card.name: Spatial Binding
